text: The Swedish Mixed Doubles Curling Championship () is the national championship of mixed doubles curling (one man and one woman) in Sweden. It has been held annually since season 2007-2008 (??).Svenska Curlingförbundet (Swedish Curling Association) (web archive) ==List of champions and medallists== Team line-ups shows in order: man, woman, coach (if exists). {|class="wikitable" ! Year ! Champion ! Runner-up !
